com.nutiteq.layers
Class Layer

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.layers.Layer
Direct Known Subclasses:
RasterLayer, VectorLayer
public abstract class Layer
extends java.lang.Object

The abstract layer class, inherited by all other layer subclasses. Contains methods for setting and checking the visibility of the layer.

Method Summary
 Components getComponents()
          Get mapping components attached to this layer.
 Projection getProjection()
          Gets the projection used by this layer.

Method Detail

getProjection

public Projection getProjection()
Gets the projection used by this layer.

Returns:
the projection used by this layer

setProjection

@Deprecated
public void setProjection(Projection projection)
Deprecated. 

Sets the projection for this layer.

Parameters:
projection - the projection for this layer

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
Checks the visibility of this layer.

Returns:
true if the layer is visible.

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean visible)
Sets the visibility of this layer.

Parameters:
visible - the new visibility state of the layer

getVisibleZoomRange

public Range getVisibleZoomRange()
Get visible zoom range. Current zoom level must be within this range for the layer to be visible.

Returns:
current visible zoom range

setVisibleZoomRange

public void setVisibleZoomRange(Range range)
Set visible zoom range. Current zoom level must be within this range for the layer to be visible. This range is half-open, thus layer is visible if range.min <= ZOOMLEVEL < range.max

Parameters:
range - new visible zoom range

isInVisibleZoomRange

public boolean isInVisibleZoomRange(float zoom)
Test if given zoom level is within visible zoom range.

Parameters:
zoom - zoom level to test
Returns:
true if given zoom level is within visible zoom range. Note that the range is half-open.

getComponents

public Components getComponents()
Get mapping components attached to this layer.

Returns:
components instance.
